publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4222 Ross Finnie: Celebrate Renfrewshire’s First World Fair Trade Day as a Fairtrade Zone—That the Parliament celebrates Renfrewshire’s first World Fair Trade Day as a Fairtrade Zone, the global day to mark the fairtrade movement having been recognised by a special meeting of Renfrewshire’s fairtrade steering group, and notes that Renfrewshire achieved Fairtrade Zone status in just over a year of cam paigning and continues to cam paign for more fairtrade across Renfrewshire.

S3M-4222 Celebrate Renfrewshire’s First World Fair Trade Day as a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 26 May 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*, Mike Rumbles*, Karen Whitefield*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Jackie Baillie*, Stewart Maxwell*, Trish Godman*, Patrick Harvie*
S3M-4222 Celebrate Renfrewshire’s First World Fair Trade Day as a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 26 May 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Sandra White*, Hugh Henry*, Robin Harper*

S3M-4222 Ross Finnie: Celebrate Renfrewshire’s First World Fair Trade Day as a Fairtrade Zone—That the Parliament celebrates Renfrewshire’s first World Fair Trade Day as a Fairtrade Zone, the global day to mark the fairtrade movement having been recognised by a special meeting of Renfrewshire’s fairtrade steering group, and notes that Renfrewshire achieved Fairtrade Zone status in just over a year of campaigning and continues to campaign for more fairtrade across Renfrewshire. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Mike Rumbles, Karen Whitefield, Ms Wendy Alexander, Bill Kidd, Gil Paterson, Jackie Baillie, Stewart Maxwell, Trish Godman, Patrick Harvie, Ken Macintosh, Sandra White, Hugh Henry, Robin Harper
S3M-4222 Celebrate Renfrewshire’s First World Fair Trade Day as a Fairtrade Zone (lodged on 26 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*
